title: Granny's Pound Cake
directions: Preheat oven to 325. After this, butter and flour your pan(s)
Put all ingredients out to warm to room temperature [ aprox 1 hr.]
Pour flour into sifter, sift and measure 3 cups, add pinch of salt, sift twice more.

cream butter, “Crisco," and sugar together with hand mixer at medium speed , add eggs 2 at a time beating on medium setting, add flavoring, add 1/3 of flour at a time beat additional minute and a half scrapping sides of bowl. put in tube pan.
Bake 1 hour, turn, bake 15 min check to see it has pulled away from edges.
Cool cake in pan 30 min. Run thin table knife around edges and wiggle. Turn out on plate upside down for 30 minutes, turn upright for additional cooling. do not cover until totally cool.
Make this 2 or 3 days ahead to ripen flavor
ingredients: 3 c White Lilly Self Rising Flour
2 tsp almond flavoring plus 1 tsp vanilla flavoring
